feature1.explanation: Both texts contain the use of quotation marks and hyphens for emphasis and to enclose direct speech.

feature2.explanation: There are differences in lexical and grammatical features. Text 1 includes more informal and aggressive language, while Text 2 is more explanatory and neutral.

feature3.explanation: Both texts exhibit similar sentence complexity and length, with the use of informal expressions in Text 1 and a more structured approach in Text 2.

feature4.explanation: Text 1 has a darker and conspiratorial tone compared to the more matter-of-fact tone in Text 2.

feature5.explanation: No significant spelling or typographical errors were found in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the differences in lexical and grammatical features, there is moderate confidence that the two texts were not written by the same author.
